title: 我的世界服务端崩溃
author: lvna
txt_content:
刚开始很顺畅fps挺高的，玩了几个小时fps十分不稳定，一会高一会低，而且是瞬间变化以下是最新的文件--- Minecraft Crash Report ----// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 19-8-6 上午10:10
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.RuntimeException: Shaders Mod detected. Please remove it, OptiFine has built-in support for shaders.
